descriptionProfile: Interventionist | Activist | Mindfulness Teacher. Recovered since 2001
Interventionist | Activist | Mindfulness Teacher. Recovered since 2001

posts.description: You may have picked up scrapes and some #scars but if you are reading this today you have not been beaten. You can't be as long as you don't give up. #Relapse is not a requirement, but it happens to so many of us. If it happens to you dust yourself off, smile with the others that have also had the #experience, and #dedicate yourself again. If anyone gives you a hard time just realize they don't even get it anyways. They are the opposite of what you're trying to achieve. Love light and insight.

Time and time again I watch people experience #positive personal #growth by a change in their perceptions without a change in their environment. You would be amazed at how your environment can change by simply looking at things differently. You can start today. Love, light, and insight.

In early recovery doing anything out of your "comfort" zone can seem impossible. Uncomfortable #Emotions and fear can crop up quickly. In those times #remember that you have permission to reinvent yourself. The chapters of the past do not have to define the #adventures of your #future. So come on in, the water feels fine.
The External works out when you understand your internal truth. Love, light, and #insight.

Reflex bag is a treadmill killer. 500 calories gone and that's not counting afterburn. 160hr average for 30 minutes. #Calorie burn is not the only perk coming out of these short intense workouts. My brain got some extra BDNF and my body got some extra HGH. Top that off with some #endorphins and #dopamine and I'm a nice guy all day:) Recovery is an amazing opportunity to form a new relationship with your body. It's not about looks it's about looking at ALL aspects of your health. Love light and insight. What's your experience with improving your physical health in recovery?
Sorry for my absence, I have been on another learning binge. Can't wait to share. When thinking about the answer to this question leave no stone unturned. Love light and insight.
Find your tribe smile, relax, be proud of your choice to be real.  #sobernewyears 15 and counting for me. Best decision I ever made. Love light and insight to all of you. Much love.

If this is your field of study or your passion please email me. I have some ideas in regards to addiction prevention and dual diagnosis screening for better treatment outcomes. I need some collaborators. Happy New Years everybody:) Respect your recovery and the progress you have made tonight by choosing to continue your journey.  #geneticist #naturopathicdoctor  #genomics #methylation #mthfrawareness  #polymorphism

Just because it's common practice doesn't mean it's ok. #History has taught us this much. Do your part. Anyone disagree? Any thoughts? I am all about helping children who are drowning in our obsolete factory styled school system. I just don't believe they should pay the price of assuming a negative label.
It's been 52 years since the surgeon general warned #America that #smoking kills you. It's fair to say a few of those 480k people got that memo, wanted to stop, but could not. #addictionisadisease
